title: ㄖ
content:
overweening
adj. 自負的
過分的；不合理的

KK [ ˋovɚˋwinɪŋ ]   
a. 形容詞
  •  自負的
  •  過分的,驕傲的
  •  過於自信的

He was overweening and 
displayed his slight skill 
before an expert on a public occasion.

他目中無人，在大庭廣眾之下班門弄斧。


overweening ambition
過分的奢望



Overweening piety used for political purposes. 
Hitler and Himmler come to mind. 
So do a few minor American figures in high places today.

為了政治竭盡心力，
我想到了希特勒和希姆萊，如今有幾個美國政客也是這樣。


As a senator, 
he had a ringside seat when the Clintons' overweening health - care project was knocked down in the 1990s.
作為一名參議院，
他清楚的目睹了90年代克林頓自負的保健項目提案被推翻的全過程。
excerpt: overweening，adj. 自負的，過分的；不合理的，KK ［ ˋovɚˋwinɪŋ ］，a. 形容詞，•  自負的，•  過分的，驕傲的，•  過於自信的，He was overweening
